headline: Rebecca Liebert nominated to Dow's Board of Directors
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) today announced its Board of Directors has nominated Rebecca Liebert, president and chief executive officer of The Lubrizol Corporation, a Berkshire Hathaway company, to stand for election at the Company's Annual Meeting of Stockholders on April 10, 2025. All other incumbent directors have also been nominated for election at the Annual Meeting.
